summary: This mod will change the damage of all Destruction Spells, without changing the damage of the NPC\'s.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/78236163@N07/6969931152/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7187/6969931152_5eeca8e27f_c.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod will change the damage of all Destruction Spells, without changing the damage of the NPC\'s. This mod does not affect how much magicka it takes to cast the spells. If you want a version that lowers or raises how much magicka it takes to cast spells. Leave me a comment saying so. Thank you.

[color=red]Spells and Location in Video[/color]
[youtube]advhFi4Vbo8[/youtube]

There is a chest in Whiterun with every spell for the people who don\'t want to buy/look for everyspell in the game. You don\'t need to use the spells in the chest for the mod to work. It\'s for lazy people :)

NOTE - All enemies (NPC\'s) Should be fully working with default spell damage. If you \"think\" you found someone i missed please tell me the person\'s name and I will check and fix if needed
author: MerethicEra
